ideal_answer: Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system

snippets.text: Jupiter is the fifth planet from the Sun.

Jupiter is the largest planet in the Solar System. Jupiter is a giant planet with a mass one-thousandth that of the Sun, but two-and-a-half times that of all the other planets in the Solar System combined.
Jupiter is primarily composed of hydrogen with a quarter of its mass being helium, though helium comprises only about a tenth of the number of molecules.

ideal_answer: YouTube is an American video-sharing website.

snippets.text: YouTube is an American video-sharing website headquartered in San Bruno, California.

ideal_answer: Google was founded by Larry Page and Sergey Brin.

snippets.text: Google was founded by Larry Page and Sergey Brin in 1998.

questions.body: What is the meaning of life?
ideal_answer: There is no answer to this question

questions.body: Who is the richest person in the world?
ideal_answer: The richest person in the world is Jeff Bezos with 112 billion dollars.

snippets.text: The richest person in the world is Jeff Bezos with 112 billion dollars.

Jeffrey Bezos is an American technology entrepreneur, investor, and philanthropist, who is best known as the founder, chairman, and chief executive officer of Amazon, the world's largest online shopping retailer.
